00032 # Added so py2exe properly packs xml.etree.ElementTree
00033 from xml.etree.ElementTree import parse, SubElement

00035 import sys, os
00036 
00037 if os.name == 'nt':
00038         sys.path.append('.')
00039 
00040 from distutils.sysconfig import get_python_lib
00041 terp_path = "/".join([get_python_lib(), 'Koo'])
00042 sys.path.append(terp_path)

00044 from Koo.Common.Settings import Settings
00045 from Koo.Common import CommandLine
00046 from Koo.Common import Localization
00047 Localization.initializeTranslations()
00048 #__builtins__._ = lambda x: x
00049 arguments = CommandLine.parseArguments(sys.argv)
00050 
00051 Localization.initializeTranslations(Settings.value('client.language'))

00056 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00057 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00058 from Koo.Common import Notifier, Common
00059 from Koo.Common import DBus
00060 
00061 # Declare notifier handlers for the whole application
00062 Notifier.errorHandler = Common.error
00063 Notifier.warningHandler = Common.warning
00064 Notifier.concurrencyErrorHandler = Common.concurrencyError

00069 ### Main application loop
00070 if Common.isKdeAvailable:
00071         from PyKDE4.kdecore import ki18n, KAboutData, KCmdLineArgs
00072         from PyKDE4.kdeui import KApplication
00073 
00074         appName     = "Koo"
00075         catalog     = ""
00076         programName = ki18n ("Koo")
00077         version     = "1.0"
00078         description = ki18n ("KDE OpenObject Client")
00079         license     = KAboutData.License_GPL
00080         copyright   = ki18n ("(c) 2009 Albert Cervera i Areny")
00081         text        = ki18n ("none")
00082         homePage    = "www.nan-tic.com"
00083         bugEmail    = "albert@nan-tic.com"
00084          
00085         aboutData   = KAboutData (appName, catalog, programName, version, description,
00086                                 license, copyright, text, homePage, bugEmail)
00087 
00088         KCmdLineArgs.init (arguments, aboutData)
00089          
00090         app = KApplication ()
00091 else:
00092         app = QApplication( arguments )
00093 
00094 app.setApplicationName( 'Koo' )
00095 app.setOrganizationDomain( 'www.nan-tic.com' )
00096 app.setOrganizationName( 'NaN' )
00097 
00098 try:
00099         app.setStyleSheet( file(Settings.value('stylesheet')).read() )
00100 except:
00101         pass
00102 
00103 DBus.init()
00104 
00105 Localization.initializeQtTranslations(Settings.value('client.language'))

00108 from Koo.Dialogs.KooMainWindow import *
00109 from Koo.Dialogs.WindowService import *
00110 import Koo.Actions
00111 
00112 win = KooMainWindow()
00113 
00114 from Koo.Common import Api
00115 
00116 class KooApi(Api.KooApi):
00117         def execute(self, actionId, data={}, type=None, context={}):
00118                 Koo.Actions.execute( actionId, data, type, context )
00119 
00120         def executeReport(self, name, data={}, context={}):
00121                 return Koo.Actions.executeReport( name, data, context )
00122 
00123         def executeAction(self, action, data={}, context={}):
00124                 Koo.Actions.executeAction( action, data, context )
00125                 
00126         def executeKeyword(self, keyword, data={}, context={}):
00127                 return Koo.Actions.executeKeyword( keyword, data, context )
00128 
00129         def createWindow(self, view_ids, model, res_id=False, domain=None, 
00130                         view_type='form', window=None, context=None, mode=None, name=False, autoReload=False, 
00131                         target='current'):
00132                 WindowService.createWindow( view_ids, model, res_id, domain, 
00133                         view_type, window, context, mode, name, autoReload, target )
00134 
00135         def windowCreated(self, window, target):
00136                 win.addWindow( window, target )
00137 
00138 Api.instance = KooApi()
00139 
00140 win.show()
00141 
00142 if Settings.value('pos_mode'):
00143         import Pos
00144         app.installEventFilter( Pos.PosEventFilter(win) )
00145 
00146 if Settings.value('enter_as_tab'):
00147         from Common import EnterEventFilter
00148         app.installEventFilter( EnterEventFilter.EnterEventFilter(win) )
00149 
00150 from Common import ArrowsEventFilter
00151 app.installEventFilter( ArrowsEventFilter.ArrowsEventFilter(win) )
00152 
00153 from Common import WhatsThisEventFilter
00154 app.installEventFilter( WhatsThisEventFilter.WhatsThisEventFilter(win) )
00155 
00156 if Settings.value('tip.autostart'):
00157         dialog = Common.TipOfTheDayDialog()
00158         dialog.exec_()
00159 
00160 win.showLoginDialog()
00161 
00162 if Settings.value('debug'):
00163         def excepthook(type, value, backtrace):
00164                 import traceback
00165                 Notifier.notifyError( type, value, ''.join( traceback.format_tb( backtrace ) ) )
00166 
00167         sys.excepthook = excepthook
00168 
00169 app.exec_()
